alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 3:40AM EST until January 15 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills of 15 below to 25 below zero. * WHERE...Northwestern Connecticut, the Capital District, Lake George Saratoga Region, Helderbergs, Taconics, Mid Hudson Valley, western Ulster, Fulton, and Montgomery Counties in eastern New York, and eastern Windham County in southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
